text.text: "Agh, to See the Spiral in such a Distorted Shape!  Manipulated for its Vortex motion!  Its Perpetual Grace!  Its beauty Tarnished…"
"My friend died, but at least I made her into a blob turret."
"I have this laser cannon turret on my shopping cart.  I push it around and everything dies.  I think I'm gonna toss it in the lake-- this just isn't fair anymore."
"Day 40.  Controls broken-- car's magic reactor makes it goes inexorably forward.  Giant rollers on front demolish forest.  Maine, here I come."
"my car is a diamond in the rough… literally"
"M249 TURRET NODDED.  IS TURRET ALIVE? FINALLY, SOMEBODY TO TALK TO!"
"Added so many things to my taxi that it went a-blaze.  Whoops."
"If I put one cargo dimension into another cargo dimension, does the universe end?"
"one day, i will be part of car, too"
"Putta little bitta dynamite and halfa landmine in an old soda can…  WHAM!  You goin' somewhere."
